typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	hashVal as string,
	TargetID as string,
	hashDiff as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> DataVaultSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> HUBSource
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SATSource
DataVaultSource derive(HKey = toString(sha2(256, toString(byName($hashVal))) ),
		hashDiffValue = sha2(256, columns()),
		LoadDateTime = currentTimestamp()) ~> hashKeys
hashKeys, TargetHubKey exists(HKey == hashID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> NewRows
HUBSource derive(hashID = toString(byName($TargetID))) ~> TargetHubKey
InsertSatRows select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name==$hashVal)),
		each(match(name=='HKey'),
			replace($$,'HKey',$TargetID) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> NewHubRecords
hashKeys select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name!=$hashVal)),
		each(match(name=='hashDiffValue'),
			replace($$,'hashDiffValue',$hashDiff) = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RenameCols
RenameCols, SATSource exists(HKey == hashKey,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatRowsExist
NewRows alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> InsertSatRows
SatRowsExist alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> NewSATRecords
NewSATRecords select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='HKey'),
			replace($$,'HKey',$TargetID) = $$),
		each(match(name=='hashDiffValue'),
			replace($$,'hashDiffValue',$hashDiff) = $$),
		each(match(name!=$hashVal)),
		each(match(name=='LoadDateTime'))
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
SATSource select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name == $TargetID),
			'HKey' = $$),
		each(match(name == 'LoadDateTime'),
			'LoadDateTime' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
NewHubRecords sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HubLoad
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SATLoad
